Description: You summon a wave of poisonous sludge that crashes down on creatures in a 30 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC, taking poison damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it becomes poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
